text: riding near the front line with the
Syrian Kurdish fighters but this one
isn't Kurdish he's American this bus
he's one of just a handful who've made
their way here to join the fight against
Isis the Kurds call him Sir partly his
real name is Jeremy what inspired a 28
year old from Mississippi developed put
his life on the line here Isis has been
killing innocent people raping women
children selling the children's slavery
running everybody from their homes kept
putting my daughter in that situation
and my own family what if they're over
here that was happening to them someone
needed to come over here show a little
bit hope to the people that other people
in countries do care and want to get
involved fight against these people
[Music]
Jeremy's served with the US Army in both
Iraq and Afghanistan he and the Kurdish
YPG fighters who include women have been
in close combat with the is militants he
says he's personally killed two of them
it doesn't make me feel like a bad
person killing an Isis member I mean to
me that's doing a good deed to the world
I mean all of them need to get it wiped
out I can't talk to people like that
there's no reasoning at all
there's gonna be a war there is a war
and I mean we have to eliminate them
here with the Kurdish fighters in Syria
Jeremy has found a comradeship he says
makes him feel the richest person in the
world he's planning to stay indefinitely
I asked him what would be his cutoff
point my dad you say that but really
you're not joking I mean you've been on
the frontline you've been in combat yeah
I mean it could happen couldn't it it's
possibility there's always a possibility
I mean I came over here some people said
it's suicide of me but maybe I mean
could they could be right but I don't
see it like that I see it as doing a
noble good cause if I'm a DA I mean I
know I came over here to try to help
Jeremy says the enemy he's fighting here
is much stronger than al-qaeda and the
Taliban that he fought in Iraq and
Afghanistan
he believes more boots are needed on the
ground if Isis is to be defeated Jim
your BBC News in Northeast Syria
